text: Arhopala araxes is a butterfly in the family Lycaenidae. It was described by Cajetan Felder and Rudolf Felder in 1865. It is found in the Indomalayan realm.Seitz, A., 1912-1927. Die Indo-Australien Tagfalter Grossschmetterlinge Erde 9 ==Subspecies== *A. a. araxes Sulawesi, Sula, Sanghie *A. a. onetor Fruhstorfer, 1914 Sumatra, Java, Sumbawa, Sumba, Savu, Timor, Kissar, Wetar, Leti *A. a. talauta (Evans, 1957) Talaut Group *A. a. verelius Fruhstorfer, 1914 ==References== ==External links== *Arhopala Boisduval, 1832 at Markku Savela's Lepidoptera and Some Other Life Forms. Retrieved June 3, 2017. Category:Arhopala Category:Butterflies described in 1863
title: Arhopala araxes
